narrative:
This a focused inspection addressing the Vet Care 2.40(b)(2) citation from the previous inspection dated May 31,
2016.  The affected animal was seen by a veterinarian and determined to be euthanized and documentation was
provided to the inspector.
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
 
Exit interview conducted with Brittany Light, ACI and facility representative.
